Package com.cyc.kb.config

This package contains useful configuration utilities of the KB API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DefaultContext
    An immutable object interface to store default contexts for assertions and queries.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KBAPIBuildInfo  
    KBAPIConfiguration
    A class to hold the configuration parameters such as, transcript flag, current cyclist and current project.
    KBAPIDefaultContext  

Package com.cyc.kb.config Description

This package contains useful configuration utilities of the KB API. KBAPIConfiguration provides thread local configuration parameters to set the current cyclist, project, default contexts for assertion and query, and transcription. Note: Bookkeeping is enabled by default, but it will not work if current cyclist is not set. DefaultContext is usually used in get and add/set methods that do not take a context parameter. The method documentation will specify the behavior in detail.
